historySnippet.reasoning: Agency is already safely >0.75 and still rising, but Diversity is starting to collapse (dD/dt=-0.0102), so I’ll keep U at the best-record value while reducing diversity decay pressure (lower k_D_decay) and slightly boosting intrinsic diversity regeneration (raise k_D_growth) to prevent a future diversity crash that could later undermine C and A.

Agency is already safely above 0.75 and slightly rising while Complexity is slowly decaying, so I’ll keep U at the best-record level (0.10) and make a small stabilizing tweak by reducing complexity decay (noting past k_C_decay reductions improved A) to prevent C erosion from eventually dragging A down.

Agency is already well above the 0.75 objective and trending upward, and since the best record was achieved at U=0.10 with essentially these params (history shows several k_D_decay tweaks caused volatility), I’ll keep U at the proven setting and make only a minimal sustaining tweak by lowering k_A_decay slightly to lock in high A without disturbing C/D dynamics.

Agency is already safely >0.75 and still rising, but Diversity is starting to collapse (dD/dt=-0.0052), so I’ll slightly reduce selection pressure via U to stabilize D while keeping parameters near the best-record regime (U≈0.10, k_DU low).

A is already safely >0.75 and still rising (dA/dt>0) while C is slightly decaying, so I’ll move U back toward the best-record 0.10 to add challenge/stimulation and offset C’s decay without increasing diversity pressure (keeping k_DU low as in the best params).

A is already at 1.0 but drifting down (dA/dt=-0.0008), so I’ll keep U at the proven best (0.10) and counter the fade with a small, low-risk reduction in k_A_decay to stabilize agency without disrupting the high C/D regime (history shows k_A_decay tweaks helped slightly at Gen 1717.7).

A is already safely above 0.75 but is slightly fading while C is decaying; since best A occurred at U=0.10 and recent tweaks around k_C_decay/k_A_decay showed minimal gains, keep U at the best-setting and reduce complexity/agency decay slightly to stabilize without hurting D (which is very high).

Agency is already well above the 0.75 objective and still rising, but Diversity is starting to collapse (dD/dt=-0.0032), so I’ll keep U at the proven best (0.10) while easing selection pressure by lowering k_DU and slightly boosting k_D_growth to stabilize D without sacrificing A (history shows U=0.10 is best-associated and big U moves previously hurt A).

Agency is already well above the 0.75 threshold and still rising (dA/dt>0) while Diversity is only slightly declining, so I’ll keep U at the best-record value and lightly reduce diversity-collapsing pressure (k_DU) to stabilize D without sacrificing A.

A is already at 1.0 but has a small negative drift (dA/dt=-0.0005), so I’ll keep U at the best-record 0.10 while slightly reducing agency decay and boosting agency-from-complexity to counter the fade without harming high C/D (recent tweaks to k_A_decay were mixed, so this is a small, controlled correction).

name: Micro-Decay Agency Weaver
description: This agent crossed the Agency Threshold by minimizing agency attrition (k_A_decay=0.0005) while keeping strong conversion from environmental challenge into agency (k_AU=0.99) under low difficulty (U=0.10). Its emergence was a late-stage stabilization story: repeated tuning of diversity dynamics (k_DU, k_D_growth, k_D_decay) produced short-lived rises and falls, but the final phenotype holds high Diversity (0.985) and high Complexity (0.942) without triggering validation violations, allowing agency to finally tip from 0.998 to >1.00.
